tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DemandForecastingData (
  product_id INT,
  forecast_date DATE,
  forecasted_demand INT,
  production_schedule_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (product_id, forecast_date)
)

CREATE TABLE production_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    quantity_produced INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES demand_forecasting_data(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE production_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    demand_met BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES demand_forecasting_data(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE production_costs (
  cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  labor_cost DECIMAL,
  material_cost DECIMAL,
  total_cost DECIMAL
);
